attributes.action: To Reinstate Nurse Margaret Haywood and to hold a review into all care for the elderly and vuleranable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nurse Margaret Haywood took part in a documentary for Panorama to expose how the elderly and vulnerable are looked after in the Royal Sussex Hospital.
I am petitioning for the reinstatement of Nurse Haywood and for the government to commission an inquiry to ensure that the old and vulnerable  are looked after with dignity and sensitivity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
